title: need gameboy colour keen help
content: My 9 year old son keeps bugging me and asking me how to beat the robobloog (?) in his Keen game for the GBC. Can anyone out there help me?? I'm desperate!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-punk.gif[/img]

title: Re: need gameboy colour keen help
content:
In the room with the Robo-Bloog [img]http://dosclassics.com/keen/images/gbc/creatures/robobloog.gif[/img] there is a red switch in the upper-right corner. When Keen stands on it, press Select. The Robo-Bloog will be shocked and run through the room and shoot flames. Keen have to avoid them. After some time, the switch gets back and Keen can press it again with Select button. After some "shockings", the Robo-Bloog is defeated.

Hope that helps! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: need gameboy colour keen help
content: You are such a champion!! My life is now worth living!! Thank you, thank you, thank you.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

title: Re: need gameboy colour keen help
content:
Yays!

Glad you got what you were looking for. Drop by again sometime will ya?
